name: Arx Fatalis
text: Arx Fatalis Far from the calm and the limelight, the most attentive of you will have been able to follow the birth and development of Arx Fatalis: a promising first-person cRPG that wants to be inspired by the great masterpieces of the past. Today, thanks to our specialists in the sector, the guys from RPGplayer, you can read the review and maybe deepen your knowledge better by playing the Demo or watching the introductory trailer.
